Package com.opatomic

Class OpaSerializer

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.io.OutputStream
      • com.opatomic.OpaSerializer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Closeable, java.io.Flushable, java.lang.AutoCloseable
    public final class OpaSerializer
extends java.io.OutputStream
    Buffered serializer that converts Objects to bytes to send via OutputStream.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      static interface  OpaSerializer.OpaSerializable
      An interface that indicates an Object knows how to serialize itself

        public OpaSerializer​(java.io.OutputStream out,

        Create a new serializer that will write to specified OutputStream.
        Parameters:
        out - Where to write values
        buffLen - Length of internal buffer to reduce write() calls to stream.
